validation.validation_queries.source_val: SELECT COUNT(*) as row_count, COUNT(DISTINCT report_id) as distinct_ids FROM {table_name}
validation.validation_queries.destinatio: SELECT COUNT(*) as row_count, COUNT(DISTINCT report_id) as distinct_ids FROM {table_name}
validation.validation_queries.data_compa: SELECT COUNT(*) as matching_rows FROM source_table s INNER JOIN destination_table d ON s.report_id = d.report_id WHERE s.data_hash = d.data_hash
validation.custom_validations.orders.sou: SELECT COUNT(*) as row_count, SUM(total_amount) as total_revenue FROM orders WHERE created_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
validation.custom_validations.orders.des: SELECT COUNT(*) as row_count, SUM(total_amount) as total_revenue FROM orders WHERE created_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '1 day'
SELECT COUNT(*) as row_count, COUNT(DISTINCT email) as unique_emails FROM customers WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT COUNT(*) as row_count, COUNT(DISTINCT email) as unique_emails FROM customers WHERE status = 'active'
